name: Dolmabahce Palace
description: Dolmabahçe Palace is used by Ottoman Sultans in late 19th century and by first two presidents of Turkish Republic. It is a magnificent and impressive palace located in Beşiktaş. It can be only seen by guided tours organized by the museum administration. Yet, as it is a famous attraction point, tours are very crowded and usually tourists complain about not getting proper information. I will be assiting you regarding, arranging a good timing to visit the palace and providing you relevant information about the palace both in english and spanish. Also we can arrange a nice lunch afterwards if you like.
